org.lenskit.knn.item

Interface ItemSimilarity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemVectorSimilarity

    @DefaultImplementation(value=ItemVectorSimilarity.class)
public interface ItemSimilarity

    Compute the similarity between two items.

    Since:
    0.11

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSparse()
      Query whether this similarity is sparse.
      boolean isSymmetric()
      Query whether this similarity is symmetric.
      double similarity(long i1, SparseVector v1, long i2, SparseVector v2)
      Compute the similarity between two items.

    • Method Detail

      • similarity

        double similarity(long i1,
                  SparseVector v1,
                  long i2,
                  SparseVector v2)

        Compute the similarity between two items.

        Parameters:
        i1 - The first item ID.
        v1 - The first item vector.
        i2 - The second item ID.
        v2 - The second item vector.
        Returns:
        The similarity between the two items, in the range [0,1].

      • isSparse

        boolean isSparse()

        Query whether this similarity is sparse.

        Returns:
        true if the similarity function is sparse.
        See Also:
        VectorSimilarity.isSparse()

      • isSymmetric

        boolean isSymmetric()

        Query whether this similarity is symmetric.

        Returns:
        true if the similarity function is symmetric.
        See Also:
        VectorSimilarity.isSymmetric()
